## Subscription.unsubscribe() method

Unsubscribe from event notifications.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract unsubscribe(options?: SubscriptionUnsubscribeOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>SubscriptionUnsubscribeOptions</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

If the subscription state is SubscriptionState.Subscribed, sends an in dialog SUBSCRIBE request with expires time of zero (an un-subscribe) and terminates the subscription. Otherwise a noop.
